about_the_game:
With the possibility of interstellar travel, a new fish-like species spread throughout the galaxy was discovered. These aquatic creatures, which people call "Xenosh", have become a hobby of gene crossing thanks to their very simple genetic map compared to life as we know it. Everyone is in a race to find their new subspecies.

This situation attracted the attention of criminal organizations and the state began to impose harsh sanctions. Finally, a special forces unit affiliated with the United World Government Ministry of Extraterrestrial Life was established. Liberal factions and black markets emerged against this harsh state tyranny.

Constantly monitor the health, disease and hunger values ​​of your Xenosh. When you meet their needs, they make you happy with their valuable production, you can even find a golden lying. A happy Xenosh gives better results in the breeding machine.

Breed two Xeonsh in the GeneFeeder device. Make selections on their genes using various serums, change mutation values ​​and experiment to discover rare features. But be careful, you may not want to push your precious Xenosh too hard.

The most popular gift these days is Xenosh. They are constantly adding new ads to the sales platform. Everyone has different preferences. If you send the Xenosh that meets these demands as soon as possible, you will earn a high tip fee along with a good reputation. We have heard that reputable producers can get special permits from the state and bend the laws "little".

UWG is passing strict laws to prevent the use of Xenosh with interesting features in the criminal world. If you do not follow these, you can be fined, have your house raided by the police, and even be sentenced to prison and find all your Xenosh dead from neglect when you return home.

People who are against these adverse restrictions of UWG are coming together and demanding both freedom and improvement of Xenosh rights. They may also have requests from you in these cases, it is up to you to help or not.

Of course, the harsh measures have created a market far from the state's eyes. Xenosh that can cause some bad uses such as acidic feces, uranium-producing, iron-eating are bought and sold in this market. If you are not afraid of the UDH special forces, it could be a profitable business for you.
detailed_description:
With the possibility of interstellar travel, a new fish-like species spread throughout the galaxy was discovered. These aquatic creatures, which people call "Xenosh", have become a hobby of gene crossing thanks to their very simple genetic map compared to life as we know it. Everyone is in a race to find their new subspecies.

This situation attracted the attention of criminal organizations and the state began to impose harsh sanctions. Finally, a special forces unit affiliated with the United World Government Ministry of Extraterrestrial Life was established. Liberal factions and black markets emerged against this harsh state tyranny.

Constantly monitor the health, disease and hunger values ​​of your Xenosh. When you meet their needs, they make you happy with their valuable production, you can even find a golden lying. A happy Xenosh gives better results in the breeding machine.

Breed two Xeonsh in the GeneFeeder device. Make selections on their genes using various serums, change mutation values ​​and experiment to discover rare features. But be careful, you may not want to push your precious Xenosh too hard.

The most popular gift these days is Xenosh. They are constantly adding new ads to the sales platform. Everyone has different preferences. If you send the Xenosh that meets these demands as soon as possible, you will earn a high tip fee along with a good reputation. We have heard that reputable producers can get special permits from the state and bend the laws "little".

UWG is passing strict laws to prevent the use of Xenosh with interesting features in the criminal world. If you do not follow these, you can be fined, have your house raided by the police, and even be sentenced to prison and find all your Xenosh dead from neglect when you return home.

People who are against these adverse restrictions of UWG are coming together and demanding both freedom and improvement of Xenosh rights. They may also have requests from you in these cases, it is up to you to help or not.

Of course, the harsh measures have created a market far from the state's eyes. Xenosh that can cause some bad uses such as acidic feces, uranium-producing, iron-eating are bought and sold in this market. If you are not afraid of the UDH special forces, it could be a profitable business for you.
name: Xenoquarium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windos 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Xenoquarium is a simulation game where you breed and sell alien aquatic creatures with unique genetic structure. You have to be careful about the harsh laws of the United Earth Government and your relations with underground organizations. Otherwise you may get into trouble.
